name: Crazy Truck Racing HD
description: Crazy Truck Racing HD is great and challenge HD truck racing game. It has fine Graphics and fast running speed. Drive your truck to finish every level. Time is short and there are many obstacles and ramps, most of them bigger than anything you climbed before. Try to finish the race with the clock and deliver all the goods to the destination without damaging the truck, every time you hit something or lose the control of the car, you lose important seconds that could help you win the game.
